summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the construction and acquisition of a watermain on East 65th Street from 20th Avenue Northeast to Ann Arbor Avenue, out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as one of the additions and betterments to and extensions of the existing water works system contemplated by Ordinance No. 52260, as amended by Ordinance No. 55300, and authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
